title: How to Make Fig Newtons Pops

steps.headline: Get small bowls or plates and separate each candy treat into each plate.
Poke a stick halfway through the middle of each Fig Newton.
Take a knife and spread a thin layer of peanut butter on each side of the Fig Newtons.
Coat the peanut butter with the treats by lightly dipping the figs into the dish that you want.
Carefully wrap each "candy Fig Newton" with plastic wrap, store in an airtight container, or serve right away.

text: Get small bowls or plates and separate each candy treat into each plate.  Poke a stick halfway through the middle of each Fig Newton.  Take a knife and spread a thin layer of peanut butter on each side of the Fig Newtons.  Coat the peanut butter with the treats by lightly dipping the figs into the dish that you want.  Carefully wrap each "candy Fig Newton" with plastic wrap, store in an airtight container, or serve right away.
